summary: This bill, the Homeland Operations and Unilateral Tactics Halting Incursions: Preventing Coordinated Subversion, Military Aggression and Lawless Levies Granting Rogue Operatives Unchecked Power Act of 2025 (or HOUTHI PC SMALL GROUP Act of 2025), aims to amend Title 18 of the United States Code to prohibit the communication of classified information via mobile or desktop messaging applications. Violators could face fines and imprisonment for up to 10 years.
